about.title: About Osmanoğlu Endüstriyel Çözümler
about.subtitle: Your Trusted CNC Machining Partner in Gebze
about.description: Osmanoğu Endüstri has been at the forefront of precision metal part manufacturing in Gebze's industrial zone. We specialize in CNC machining services, delivering high-quality components to various industries with unmatched precision and reliability.

features.title: Advanced CNC Technology
features.description: State-of-the-art CNC machines ensuring micron-level precision for all metal parts.
